required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating the Effect of Tooth Cleaning Devices on Oral Health
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating the Effect of a Novel Interproximal Cleaning Device on Oral Health

brief_summary.textblock: This is a study to evaluate the safety and the efficacy of tooth and interproximal cleaning modalities on oral health.

primary_outcome.description: Residual protein concentration of interproximal plaque samples

secondary_outcome.description: Residual protein concentration of interproximal plaque samples
Gingival inflammation evaluation on an ordinal scale of 0 to 4 (0 is best ; 4 is worst)
Gingival inflammation evaluation on an ordinal scale of 0 to 4 (0 is best ; 4 is worst)
Gingival bleeding evaluation using an ordinal scale of 0 to 3; (0 is best; 3 is worst)
Gingival bleeding evaluation using a ordinal scale of 0 to 3; (0 is best; 3 is worst)

arm_group.description: Manual Toothbrush used for 1 minute twice a day
Manual Toothbrush used for 2 minutes twice a day
Manual Toothbrush used twice a day for 2 minutes plus Interproximal Cleaning Device used once a day
Manual Toothbrush used twice a day for 2 minutes plus Interproximal Cleaning Device used twice a day

intervention.description: A standard size manual toothbrush to clean visible tooth surfaces
An electronic device that combines water and air to clean between the teeth

measure.title: Age
measure.description: 1 subject who discontinued prior to Day 14 is excluded from the Manual Toothbrush 2 group 1 subject who discontinued prior to Day 14 is excluded from Manual Toothbrush + Interproximal Cleaning Device 1 group

measure.title: Gender
measure.description: 1 subject who discontinued prior to Day 14 is excluded from the Manual Toothbrush 2 group 1 subject who discontinued prior to Day 14 is excluded from Manual Toothbrush + Interproximal Cleaning Device 1 group

outcome.title: Residual Protein Concentration
outcome.description: Residual protein concentration of interproximal plaque samples
outcome.population: Analysis of efficacy data was performed using a modified intent-to-treat population (MITT). The MITT Population included all randomized subjects with both a baseline and endpoint evaluation. Missing data were not imputed.

event.description: Assessed by the PI as definitely not related to the investigational product. SAE outcome was recovered/resolved.

event.sub_title: Apthous ulcer above tooth #7 on attached gingiva

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Philips shall have the final authority to determine whether or not to publish study results.

point_of_contact.organization: Philips Healthcare, Office of Medical and Health Affairs
